Class QuantimodoApiV2

      • getMeasurmentHistory

        public SdkResponse<ArrayList<HistoryMeasurement>> getMeasurmentHistory(android.content.Context context,
                                                              String token,
                                                              Date startTime,
                                                              Date endTime,
                                                              String variableName,
                                                              String source,
                                                              String toUnitName)
        Get measurements in specified range
        Parameters:
        context - Context
        token - OAuth Token
        startTime - timestamp from ( instead of 0 use 1 )
        endTime - timestamp to
        variableName - variable name
        source - source name, which is name of application that submitted measurement
        toUnitName - convert to unit
        Returns:
        SdkReponse with ArrayList of HistoryMeasurement

      • getMeasurmentHistory

        public SdkResponse<ArrayList<HistoryMeasurement>> getMeasurmentHistory(android.content.Context context,
                                                              String token,
                                                              Date createdAt,
                                                              Date updatedAt,
                                                              String variableName,
                                                              String source,
                                                              String toUnitName,
                                                              Integer limit,
                                                              Integer offset)
        Get measurements in specified range
        Parameters:
        context - Context
        token - OAuth Token
        startTime - timestamp from ( instead of 0 use 1 )
        endTime - timestamp to
        variableName - variable name
        source - source name, which is name of application that submitted measurement
        toUnitName - convert to unit
        limit - limit request by number of measurements
        offset - used with limit, for paging results
        Returns:
        SdkReponse with ArrayList of HistoryMeasurement

      • putMeasurements

        public SdkResponse<Integer> putMeasurements(android.content.Context context,
                                   String token,
                                   List<MeasurementSet> measurementSets)
        Send measurements
        Parameters:
        context - Context
        token - OAuth token
        measurementSets - List of MeasurementSets
        Returns:
        Sdk response, contains integer value, which equals "1" for successful request

      • searchVariables

        public SdkResponse<ArrayList<Variable>> searchVariables(android.content.Context context,
                                               String token,
                                               String search,
                                               int limit,
                                               int offset,
                                               String source,
                                               String category)
        Search for variables, as default includes the public ones on the search
        Parameters:
        context - Context
        token - OAuth token
        search - Search string
        limit - size of response
        offset - offset of response
        source - source name, which is name of application that submitted measurement
        category - variable category
        Returns:
        SdkResponse with ArrayList of Variable

      • searchVariables

        public SdkResponse<ArrayList<Variable>> searchVariables(android.content.Context context,
                                               String token,
                                               String search,
                                               int limit,
                                               int offset,
                                               String source,
                                               String category,
                                               boolean includePublics)
        Search for variables
        Parameters:
        context - Context
        token - OAuth token
        search - Search string
        limit - size of response
        offset - offset of response
        source - source name, which is name of application that submitted measurement
        category - variable category
        includePublics - filter that includes or not the public variables for the request
        Returns:
        SdkResponse with ArrayList of Variable

      • requestCSV

        public SdkResponse<Integer> requestCSV(android.content.Context context,
                              String token)
        calls /measurements/request_csv service which schedule a CSV export containing all user measurements to be emailed to the user within 24 hours.
        Parameters:
        context - the current app context
        token - a valid token
        Returns:
        the id of the task request on the server
